p: To dissect this hyporesponsive phenotype, we examined the expression levels of several proliferation, death and exhaustion markers among detectable T CD8. Cognate tetramer + T CD8 from SEB-treated animals showed diminished expression of Ki67 but elevated levels of Fas and LAG-3 on a per-cell basis ( Fig 5D). In addition, there was a trend towards increased PD-1, especially in HA 518-specific cells. Therefore, exposure to SEB may impede the proliferative capacity of anti-IAV memory T CD8 and render them prone to death or exhaustion when animals encounter another IAV serotype with conserved internal epitopes.
